Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Yawn... So... why did you wake me up again?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi yawns, his eyes completely unfocused. He does not look awake at all.'}
{2: "It's Valentine's Day today. I want to give this to you.", 3: '7'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "A mystery box? Oh. You did say you don't know what's inside either.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi takes the box and slowly unwraps it. He might not look awake, but he is carefully removing and folding the wrapping paper before putting it under his pillow.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Hmm... "Why Are You Always Tired: Astrology And Magnetic Field Against Subhealth"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Now I'm wondering if you really didn't know what was inside.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi flips open the book as he says that. After speed-reading through it, his eyes suddenly light up a bit.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Hold on... this author knows his stuff. According to this, the place with the best magnetic field for sleeping... is that breakroom.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi stands up and gathers his things, seemingly preparing to leave for a better magnetic field.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Do you want to join me, Commandant? His theory claims that that room offers the best sleeping experience.', 4: '1'}
{2: "If you say so. Yawn... I'm a little tired anyway."}
